properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 19 at 9:13AM AKST until January 20 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow. Additional
snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches. For the Wind Chill
Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 30
below zero.

* WHERE...Taiya Inlet and Klondike Highway.

* WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until midnight AKST
tonight. For the Wind Chill Advisory, until noon AKST today.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The cold wind chills
could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30
minutes.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall through this morning of 1 to 3
inches. Snowfall will diminish this evening.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a
hat, and gloves.

For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit
511.alaska.gov.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT AKST TONIGHT FOR THE NORTHERN INNER CHANNELS... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST TODAY
